baseline_groups.claim_summary: Pessimistic beliefs about personal gains from a carbon tax with dividend reduce support for the policy.
baseline_groups.notes: OLS of tax_acceptance on believes_not_lose with full controls. Self-interest channel (Table 4).

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Beliefs about environmental effectiveness of carbon tax increase policy approval.
baseline_groups.notes: Environmental effectiveness channel. tax_approval outcome, believes_effective treatment.

global_notes: Two channels: self-interest and environmental effectiveness. Drop_left/right/extreme_right identical to baseline (zero coefficients). Some alt outcome specs also change treatment.
